SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlotterysystem

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlotterysystem.Event
public class Event extends Object
Represents an Event in the lottery system with details such as name, description, user lists, and geo-settings. Provides functionality to generate a QR code for the event.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor

    Default constructor required for Firestore serialization.

  • Constructor Details

    • Event

      public Event()
      Default constructor required for Firestore serialization.

    • Event

      public Event(int eventID, String name, String description, int limitChosenList, int limitWaitingList, boolean geoSetting)
      Constructor to create a new Event with necessary details such as event ID, name, description, limits, and geo settings.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The unique identifier for the event.
      name - The name of the event.
      description - A description of the event.
      limitChosenList - The limit of participants chosen for the event.
      limitWaitingList - The limit of participants on the waiting list.
      geoSetting - A boolean indicating if geolocation settings are enabled.

    • generateQR

      public void generateQR()
      Generates a QR code for the event using the event ID. The QR code is encoded as a Base64 string and stored in the `hashCodeQR` field.
